content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Original Stone Furnace at position (43, -82)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 43, -82)

### New Stone Furnace at position (45, -82)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 45, -82)

### Burner Mining Drill at position (40, -84)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 40, -84) and a wooden chest (position 39.5, -85.5) for coal storage

### Copper Plate Factory
Consists of:
- Original Stone Furnace (position 43, -82)
- New Stone Furnace (position 45, -82)
- Burner Mining Drill (position 40, -84)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough capacity to accept the items you are inserting. Check the inventory of the furnace before inserting items.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to avoid attempting to insert items when you are at capacity or when the target entity is full.
